q: ` Tourist' actress and Brad Pitt are looking to give a home to a four-year-old girl called Leah. Leah lost her entire family during that devastating Haiti earthquake in 2010. government in Ivory Coast said it continues to take money from the country's central bank account, more than three weeks after the bank said it would only recognize requests from the rival administration of Alassane Ouattara . Our government is withdrawing money on a daily basis, Ahoua Don Mello , an adviser to Gbagbo, said by phone today. The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman.
